abstract.t: Gateway-Initiated Dual-Stack lite (GI-DS-lite) is a modified approachto the original Dual-Stack lite (DS-lite) applicable to certaintunnel-based access architectures. GI-DS-lite extends existingaccess tunnels beyond the access gateway to an IPv4-IPv4 NAT usingsoftwires with an embedded context identifier, that uniquelyidentifies the end-system the tunneled packets belong to. The accessgateway determines which portion of the traffic requires NAT usinglocal policies and sends/receives this portion to/from this softwiretunnel.
